sentences.en: " I won't go, Rhett. I can't until this -- misunderstanding is cleared up. "
sentences.cn: " 我不想去, 瑞德, 我不能去,在这 ---- 在这次误会澄清以前.

sentences.en: A trivial misunderstanding caused a breach between them.
sentences.cn: 小小的误会引起了他们之间的不和.

sentences.en: He added " What happened before grew out of a misunderstanding.
sentences.cn: 又说: “ 以往之事皆出误会,望勿介意. ”

sentences.en: His misunderstanding of language was the primary cause of his other problems.
sentences.cn: 他对语言的误解是引起其他问题的主要原因。

sentences.en: I am hopeful this misunderstanding will be rectified very quickly.
sentences.cn: 我相信这个误会将很快得到纠正。

sentences.en: Misunderstanding me , Pu hurried to explain, " You don't believe me?
sentences.cn: 普之仁误会我的意思, 赶紧说: “ 你不信 么 ?

sentences.en: The misunderstanding between us has been cleared up.
sentences.cn: 我们之间的误会涣然冰释.

sentences.en: The quarrel originated in a misunderstanding.
sentences.cn: 争吵是由于误解而引起的.

sentences.en: The trouble ensued from this misunderstanding.
sentences.cn: 这些麻烦是由此误会而产生的.

sentences.en: There must be some misunderstanding—I thought I ordered the smaller model.
sentences.cn: 一定是搞错了—我以为我订的是更小型号的。

sentences.en: There must have been some misunderstanding. I didn’t order all these books.
sentences.cn: 一定是弄错了，这些书不全是我订的。

sentences.en: There seems to be a misunderstanding between us.
sentences.cn: 我们之间好像有些误解.

sentences.en: These criticisms are based on misunderstanding.
sentences.cn: 这些评论完全是出于误解.

sentences.en: This is liable to cause misunderstanding.
We try to preclude any possibility of misunderstanding.
sentences.cn: 我们努力排除任何误解的可能性.

sentences.en: Wouldn't a mere indication from my cousin clear up the misunderstanding? "
sentences.cn: 只要表姐有个表示,这误解不是就弄明白了? ”

trans.tran_cn: 误解，误会，意见不一，争执
trans.tran_en: a problem caused by someone not understanding a question, situation, or instruction correctly
